Body:
self.actions.add(name='CreateVPC', pre_conditions={'vpc': False, 'db': 
    False, 'app': False}, effects={'vpc': True, 'db': False, 'app': False},
    shell='awscli vpc create')
self.actions.add(name='CreateDB', pre_conditions={'vpc': True, 'db': False,
    'app': False}, effects={'vpc': True, 'db': True, 'app': False}, shell=
    'awscli vpc create')
assert 'CreateVPC' == str(self.actions.get(name='CreateVPC'))
assert 'CreateDB' == str(self.actions.get(name='CreateDB'))
